Value.description: Middle Mouse Select and Paste This plugin emulates Linux GPM functions within the editors in linux and Windows using the middle mouse button and shiftKey + middleMouse button. If selected text, paste selected text at current cursor position. If selected text, and middleMouse-click inside selection, copy to clipboard. If no selected text, paste clipboard data at cursor position(like ctrl-v). If selected text, and user switches editors, copy selection to clipboard. If selected text, and shiftKeyDown, replace selected text with clipboard text.
